evidence.text:
Person B: It's Glinda now! Stupid idea, I don't even know what made me do it!
Person B: I don't care! I want him! I don't even think he's perfect anymore, and I still want him! This must be what other people feel like. How do they bear it?

Person B: Now don't you cry! You're going to have the wonderfullest time.
Person B: But--
Person A: I am Elphaba. Thropp. Your Oz-ness. And this is--
Person B: Something bad is happen ing to them. They need you.

Person A: Oh. But-- how could I-- ever--
Person A: Are these-- words?

Person B: But it's hurting him !
Person B: Chistery, what's wrong?
Person B: It's-- you. You're behind it all. People, turning against the Animals... it's because of you.
Person B: Elphie, listen to them. Please.
Person A: Elphie. Listen to me--

Person B: Elphaba. Listen to me-- just say you're sorry--
Person A: Glinda...? What is it...?

Person A: Elphie, you're trembling. Here-- put this around you.
Person A: Elphie, nooo!
